General.Name: Itim Group PLC
General.Description: Itim Group plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides software and technology solutions in the United Kingdom, Europe, and internationally. The company offers retail software solutions, including omni-channel sales and services, enterprise order management, price and stock optimization, and supplier management solutions. It also provides data exchange, and software consultancy and supply services; and develops and distributes software products. Itim Group plc was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Atlas House, London, United Kingdom, SW1E 5NH
